00010 #include"adflib.h"

00013 void MyVer(char *msg)
00014 {
00015     fprintf(stderr,"Verbose [%s]\n",msg);
00016 }
00017

00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct Partition part1;
00028     struct Partition **partList;
00029 
00030     adfEnvInitDefault();
00031 
00032 
00033     /* a zip disk */
00034     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev",2891,1,68);
00035     if (!hd) {
00036         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00037         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00038     }
00039 
00040     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00041 
00042     partList = (struct Partition**)malloc(sizeof(struct Partition*));
00043     if (!partList) exit(1);
00044 
00045     part1.startCyl = 2;
00046     part1.lenCyl = 2889;
00047     part1.volName = strdup("zip");
00048     part1.volType = FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE;
00049 
00050     partList[0] = &part1;
00051     adfCreateHd(hd,1,partList);
00052     free(partList);
00053     free(part1.volName);
00054 
00055     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00056     if (!vol) {
00057         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00058         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00059         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00060     }
00061 
00062     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00063     adfUnMount(vol);
00064     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00065 
00066 
00067     /* mount the created device */
00068 
00069     hd = adfMountDev("newdev",FALSE);
00070     if (!hd) {
00071         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00072         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00073     }
00074 
00075     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00076 
00077     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00078     if (!vol) {
00079         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00080         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00081         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00082     }
00083 
00084     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00085 
00086     adfUnMount(vol);
00087     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00088 
00089 
00090     adfEnvCleanUp();
00091 
00092     return 0;
00093 }
